Interface summary

ColorModel_Interface An interface for color model classes

Class summary

ColorException
Color \Cmp3\Graphics\Color is a package for
ColorNames_Rgb This class gives access to colornames with corresponing rgb colors
ColorModel_rgb color model defines RGB colors
ColorModel_Hsl HSL (also called HSI or HLS) color model defines colors in terms of Hue, Saturation, and Lightness (also Luminance, Luminosity or Intensity).
Exception Graphics exception
